document_data.name: Mother Lahamma's House
document_data.mainbody: '''Mother Lahamma's House''' was one of several boarding houses in the city of [[Arabel]] in [[Cormyr]].
document_data.Location: The establishment was located outside the city walls, north{{Arabel map orientation}} of the [[High Road (Cormyr)|High Road]] and just before [[High Horn Gate]]. It sat across the street from the [[Night Wolf Inn]].
